original_text: and you are to teach the people of Israel all the statutes that the Lord has spoken to them by Moses.”
korean_text: 또 나 여호와가 모세를 통하여 모든 규례를 이스라엘 자손에게 가르치리라

sentences.original_text: and you are to teach the people of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 이스라엘 백성을 가르쳐야 하느니라

sentences.original_text: that the Lord has spoken to them by Moses.
